title: Update Upload tab animated logo to new round red PATENTED asset + fix PDF/app text overlap

requirements.text: Add the user’s latest round red "PATENTED" logo as a new static generated image asset (background-removed/transparent) under frontend/public/assets/generated, to be used only for the Upload tab empty-state animation.

quotes: BUILD AND LOGO IS I UPLOAD IN ROUND RED COLOUR ALL WRITTEN PATENTED IN MIDDILE OF LOGO FOR FLIPING AND CONTIOUNS ROTATING DONT CHANGE DIRECTION

acceptanceCriteria: A new transparent-cutout logo file exists in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in the Image Requirements section.
The asset has a transparent background (no solid rectangle behind the circular logo).
No other existing branding assets (header logo, PDF header logo, PDF watermark logo) are replaced or modified as part of adding this asset.

requirements.text: Update the Upload tab empty-state UI (when no workbook is loaded) to use the new round red PATENTED logo asset, render it centered, and make it slightly smaller than the current image size.
acceptanceCriteria: When workbook is null, UploadTab renders the new logo image source (not /assets/generated/ptntd-cutout.dim_1200x1200.png).
The rendered logo appears centered and is visually smaller than the previous max-w-md presentation (e.g., reduced max width), while remaining clearly readable.
No changes are made to the app header logo sizing/branding as part of this requirement.

requirements.text: Change the Upload tab empty-state logo animation so it continuously rotates in a single direction (no direction reversal) while preserving the existing flip effect as requested; the rotation must be smooth, slow, loop forever, and must be on-screen only (must not impact any export generation).

quotes: ...FOR FLIPING AND CONTIOUNS ROTATING DONT CHANGE DIRECTION

acceptanceCriteria: The Upload empty-state logo has a continuous rotation animation that loops smoothly and does not use any alternating/reverse direction behavior.
The flip animation still occurs on the Upload empty-state logo (flip + rotation both visible, not mutually exclusive).
The rotation speed is slow/gentle (similar to the prior ‘slow flip’ expectation), and respects motion-reduction (animation disabled with prefers-reduced-motion).
PDF exports and Excel exports are unchanged (no animated assets or animation logic is introduced into export code paths).

requirements.text: Fix PDF export layout so no text overlaps anywhere, including header contact lines, footer lines, and table cell content; ensure multi-page exports remain readable with consistent margins and spacing.

quotes: IN THE EVERY PDF DONT OVERLAP TEXT ANY WHERE PROPER FORMATING

acceptanceCriteria: Exported PDFs (from Results and History) have no overlapping text in the header, footer, or table area.
Long header/footer strings and long cell values are handled without overlapping (wrap and/or truncate as needed), and content stays within page margins.
Multi-page exports preserve the same header/footer spacing and do not overlap with the table content on any page.

requirements.text: Fix in-app UI formatting issues that can cause text overlap in the visible application (non-PDF), adjusting spacing/wrapping/alignment as needed while keeping all user-facing text in English.
acceptanceCriteria: No visible text overlaps other UI elements in the main app layout at typical desktop widths and narrow/mobile widths (responsive).
Any adjustments preserve existing workflows and do not introduce new user-facing non-English text.

constraints: Use only English for any visible/user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components must be composed, not modified).
Do not change the direction of the new continuous rotation animation (must not reverse/alternate).
The new round red PATENTED logo/animation change applies only to the Upload tab empty state; do not replace the app header logo or any PDF watermark/header logo assets.
Do not route images through the backend; store and load them as static frontend assets.
nonGoals: Changing Update Checking, VLOOKUP logic, History persistence, or export file formats beyond fixing PDF layout/overlap issues.
Replacing the existing PDF watermark tablet-logo asset or Crystal Atlas header logo asset.

required: Round red circular logo with the word "PATENTED" centered, transparent background cutout (patented-round-red-cutout.dim_1200x1200.png)
